author: Austen Hufford
title: L.L. Bean to End Unlimited Returns, Citing Customer Misuse
text:
Outdoor-goods seller L.L. Bean Inc. is putting limits on its well-known, and generous, return policy.
The family-owned company had allowed customers to return products even years later if they werenâ€™t satisfied with their purchases. But on Friday L.L. Bean said it now will let customers return products for a refund only within one year, if they have a receipt or proof of purchase.
